website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy winch that works well and looks great.
pros: Available in black or steel colors, as well as a 4,500 pound version
Sturdy construction, and very strong pull
cons: Some arrive with missing bolts or other pieces
Reports of quality issues that include ropes fraying or breaking and the winch losing power over time

customer_reviews.title: Plastic and metal gearing just pure junk.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Gearing is plastic and metal. Put it on utv and hooked it up to snow plow and hit button to lift up and bam plow hit the ground and winch made a bad grinding noise. Contacted customer service and sent pictures and they want me to pay $45 for the parts. There should be some kind of warranty on this winch, its barely a month old!
customer_reviews.author: John Reichelderfer

customer_reviews.title: Will not accept the KFI winch bracket
customer_reviews.text: The viper midnight winch WILL NOT work with KFI winch brackets without making some serious alterations to it. I finally made it work on my 2018 polaris sportsman 450 ho. The bracket fit the atv great, but would not accept the viper midnight winch. You've been warned!
customer_reviews.author: M. Salmon

customer_reviews.title: The rope broke on the second pull
customer_reviews.text: I bought this winch based on mostly good customer reviews. We installed the winch on our Rzr 900S and took it to the trails. The first time we got stuck the winch worked like a charm and pulled us right out. The second time we got stuck the rope broke. By the grace of God our friends had their winch and some other riders helped us out. I would not recommend this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Maybe just a bad one!
customer_reviews.text: Worked about 8 times in and out and now only goes out. Will not winch in. Locks up. Checked everything from the contractor, etc. Returning it for a replacement and see how that goes. If it fails again I am just going to get a refund and buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: ian

customer_reviews.title: Very good winch for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my 2012 Can-am Rennagade. Havent had the first problem out of it yet. I've been pulling Sxs and trucks out with it. Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Bo Selman

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome! I haven’t used it yet but It looks decently built. I installed this on my rzr... the winch comes with a handlebar mounted switch with I didn’t use and installed a rocker switch in the cab instead. The provided leads were a bit short in my opinion. The power leads (red/black) are only about 3’ long. The battery in the rzr is under the rear seat and with the solenoid mounted in the front, it was way too short. I ended up switch the power leads for the winch leads (yellow/blue) and it fit, but was definitely tight. Overall, it looks decent ... again, I haven’t actually used it yet so time will tell!...
customer_reviews.author: 60diesel60

customer_reviews.title: Car puller
customer_reviews.text: I use this winch to pull my drag car on the trailer. It doesn't struggle at all. Very nice. It looks cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for Polaris mounts
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with Polaris sportsman mounts, Even the one this company sells for its own winch. Sent it back and ordered a KFI. May be good to mount on a trailer, does not fit mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible winch, never worked right and broke before even having it for a month only used about 4 times
customer_reviews.author: Gaige

customer_reviews.title: POWERFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful! I used this on my Brute force, and have pulled out Side by sides with ease. Quick spool and perfect with the synthetic line. NO more rusty cable. haha seems to be holding up pretty good. Wiring harness was perfect and heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for offroad
customer_reviews.text: I was leery about buying this winch because it's on the cheaper side and off brand. I've ran it for almost 2 years on my rzr 1000 4 seater and put it through hell. Winched everything, from stuck 4 wheelers, a ford explorer all the way to a samurai on 42s thoroughly impressed. I did have to upgrade ropes as I broke 2 of them. I ruined the winch by allowing the terminals to be uncovered and I stripped the studs during removal of my front diff. I'm ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: garrisson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Installed correctly with the proper mount for my ranger. Lifted up my plow and this happened. Not great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Holt

customer_reviews.title: Long wires. Be aware of fairlead size
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this to a KFI mount on a 2019 Polaris RZR xp4 1K. The only issue that I ran into is the fairlead that comes with this is 4 7/8, where RZR needs 6". Would be nice if the wires came with the crimps on the side so you can shorten the obnoxiously long wires.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy to install works great gotten the switch wet several times still works.update I ended up having the issue with the switch like everyone said a rain storm on the way back from riding killed it but the relay still works. I just bought the warn switch off here and but other then that the winch has never failed me
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great winch!
customer_reviews.text: Great winch! High quality. Easy install. Bought for my 2020 Honda Foreman 520.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: ... had a problem with the wires too short but excellent customer service got me longer wires
customer_reviews.text: initially had a problem with the wires too short but excellent customer service got me longer wires. The winch works well is a good add on to my pioneer
customer_reviews.author: tmed007

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Got to use it finally and it did great! We had multiple pulls of nearly the entire 50' . Was able to do the pulls with one person in the driver seat. Free spool worked great even under mud and water. Only problem was had to drill mounting holes to meat the bracket.
customer_reviews.author: S&A Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Use three time and it is toast. Not work the money. Do not but this is item unless you like to install and uninstall winch.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Mount won't work on Polaris razor xp 1000
customer_reviews.text: If you are ordering this for a polaris rzr xp 1000 the fairlead and mount will not work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Viper winch
customer_reviews.text: Winch is nice winch. For easy install be sure to get rocker switch wiring harness from viper. Overall winch has decent amount of power. Cable isn’t very strong. Best application I’ve would be ATV little small for sxs
customer_reviews.author: Derrick bass

customer_reviews.title: What’s the warranty
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all. Let out on the first time and it never came back in.
customer_reviews.author: Snappywife

customer_reviews.title: Cheapiest winch and components ever worked with.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap China rebrand. Installed, raised and lowered plow ten times, switch works sometimes, rope frayed already, all parts and wiring just really cheap. Not whatb expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hoogana

customer_reviews.title: works great and super easy to instal
customer_reviews.text: amazing product very strong i highly recommend this winch kit I've bought several other winch kits and by far is one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel_Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: It’s weak
customer_reviews.text: Tried to witch up the utv in the trailer and it wouldn’t even do that
customer_reviews.author: LeAnna W.

customer_reviews.title: I had a friend recommend this and I have been very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I had a friend recommend this and I have been very happy with it. Several of us have this winch and none of us have had problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great for lifting and lowering my plow for winter
customer_reviews.text: Mounted on my Polaris Ranger. Additional mounting bracket is necessary. Great for lifting and lowering my plow for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Polaris Ranger - already used it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our Polaris Ranger - already used it to pull the tractor that was stuck in the wet field. Works great and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: S. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Well made winch.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it it yet but it looks well made ,had good reviews though it would be nice to have a schematic in instructions .
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Rust

customer_reviews.title: Pick harbor freight!
customer_reviews.text: Just 2 months out of warranty, whole winch burnt up and took the wiring and battery with it. Professionally installed and very lite infrequent use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great winch
customer_reviews.text: Great winch for the price , I have two from motoalance great customer service great product
customer_reviews.author: Jerry campbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THIS WINCH FIT MY CUB-CADET UTV SIDE BY SIDE PEFFECT & WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.author: dwayneleverette

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It’s strong and smooth. If your ATV isn’t set up for a winch, the wiring can be tricky! It took about 4-5 hours to completely assemble and wire.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Miller

customer_reviews.title: Compatibility of UTV
customer_reviews.text: Rather vague on instructional side. Also leads are short. FYI- Next purchaser of this product should purchase the extended battery leads.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts !!! Didn’t come with fair lead braket... miss leading!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Viper
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Been deep in water and works everytime I push the button. Make sure you order the right winch mount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Worked good at first but made a few riding trips with my atv and broke the rope twice and think the gears are stripped out after a certain amount of pressure starts grinding only used on a 800lb atv
customer_reviews.author: justin m.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and value
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Not the easiest to install. But if your mechanically inclined it should be easy.
customer_reviews.author: cory Wojtanowicz

customer_reviews.title: Got two years out of it.
customer_reviews.text: First year the rope broke, second year it doesn’t have any strength. Can’t pull itself downhill.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and works GREAT!! But the rope broke the second time I used it,
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE KING

customer_reviews.title: Great winch!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a very sturdy winch, very easy to install. I only gave it 4 stars because there was no hook in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good price, fairly easy install, arrived on time and works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturers mounting bolt hole tapped wrong
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a nice winch and looks great, how ever one mounting hole was drilled and tapped at such an angle I can on mount it to my new atv with 3 bolts
customer_reviews.author: Justin parenteau

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very strong easy to install. I replaced a 3500 lb winch with this one And it bolted right in with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent S.

customer_reviews.title: Winch worked great at first but is now almost a paper weight
customer_reviews.text: Winch worked great at first but is now almost a paper weight.. Winch has no power when pulling. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Daniel goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This product installed easily and has been working great for operating my snowplow.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Peiffer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome winch. Has no problem lifting my plow and pulling my atv out of tight places.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely disappointed with Motoalliance Winch's!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to sell a kit with a fairlead all in one package and you're fairly doesn't even bolt up to the parts that came with it... Motoalliance's Winch Design team must of been in the back shed getting baked out of their minds because they've completely failed with this winch and fairlead bolts system!!! Like when you design this did you ever think to actually put one together before you send them out to customers?!?!?! If you want to have to go buy a bunch of different bolts and everything else because motoalliance didn't want to do the research.... this is the winch system for you! Otherwise by any other brand and you'll be happy compared to MotoAlliance
customer_reviews.author: I won't steer you wrong!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every thing I needed to install great price.no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: rom s

customer_reviews.title: Thought bigger would work!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Viper winches! With that being said the 4500lb winch will not fit through the bracket that I have for my Polaris sportsman 850 XP HO. I plan on using it elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Palardy

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it the motor shorted out trying to warranty it and all I get is the run around. Please give me some help to get it replased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need seller to contact me please
customer_reviews.text: I need someone to contact me about my winch it has burned up and i need to get it replaced with the warranty
customer_reviews.author: Alston branham

customer_reviews.title: Worked great the first time
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first time. Let me down halfway through a pull second use. 4500lbs winch should have had no problem pulling a 1400 sxs.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Rope broke second day and motor quit within one week.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Medlock

product_meta.title: MotoAlliance VIPER Midnight ATV/UTV Winch 3000lb with 50 feet BLACK Synthetic Rope
product_meta.description:
Size:3000| Color:BlackThe VIPER Midnight 3,000lb Winch is a durable winch for ATVs, UTVs and Side by Sides. A great winch for snowplowing and mudding with ATV and UTVs, it has a sealed planetary metal gear train, a 1.1 horsepower permanent magnet motor, automatic brake, and stainless-steel hardware. Waterproof handle bar switch and synthetic rope are standard on this Midnight winch. 

Important Safety Features 
All VIPER winches contain safety features including mechanical and dynamic braking systems (automatically hold 100% of the winch capacity & reduce the chance of rope creep when power is applied) and a sealed solenoid. 

Specs 
- Cable - Dyneema 
- Motor - 12V DC, Sealed 1.1HP permanent magnet 
- Rated Line Pull - 3,000lbs (1360.78 kgs) 
- Line Speed - 0 lbs - 18 Amps motor draw / 25 FPM (7.62 MPM) 
- Line Speed - 3,000lbs - 202 Amps motor draw / 7 FPM (2.13 MPM) 
- Gearing / Gear Ratio - 3-Stage planetary/136:1 
- Brake - Automatic, 100% load holding 
- Clutch - Cam Activated 
- Mounting Bolt Pattern - 3.0 inch x 4.875 inch (76mm x 123.83mm) 
- 1 Year Warranty (winch) / 6 month Warranty (rope) 


Kit Contents 
- 50ft BLACK Synthetic Rope 
- Aluminum Hawse Fairlead 
- Contact/Solenoid 
- Clevis Hook 
- Wiring 
- Installation Hardware and Instructions 


Technical Support 
- Phone: available Monday-Thursday 9am-4pm CST; Friday 9am-1pm CST at 866.527.7637, option3 
- Email: available Monday-Friday 8am-10pm CST; Weekends 10am-8pm CST.
feature_bullets: Includes Rocker Handlebar Switch, Contactor/Solenoid, Wiring, Hawse Fairlead, 50ft Black Synthetic Rope
Compatible with all major brands including Polaris, Yamaha, Can-Am, Yamaha, Honda, Kubota, Kawasaki, Suzuki, Arctic Cat CF-Moto + MORE...
Steel Planetary Gears and Stainless Steel Hardware; 1.1 HP permanent magnet motor w/ mechanical load holding and dynamic brake
Offset Cable - check mount plate requirements for exact fitment

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars152 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
